title: Courtesy
description: Courtesy, or 예의 (ye-wee), reminds us to show respect in the dojang and beyond through sincere etiquette and kindness.

title: Integrity
description: Integrity, or 염치 (yom-chee), calls for honesty, strong morals, and the courage to do what is right even when it is difficult.

title: Perseverance
description: Perseverance, or 인내 (een-nay), is the willingness to keep pushing toward every goal despite obstacles in training or life.

title: Self Control
description: Self control, or 극기 (gook-gee), keeps thoughts, emotions, and actions in balance so we can respond with a steady mind and body.

title: Indomitable Spirit
description: Indomitable spirit, or 백절불굴 (baekjool boolgool), to be defeated a hundred times yet never bent - the heart of true strength.
